name: Eggy the Handyman
blurb: He's pretty careless, but somehow he still manages to help a bit.
unlocking: Eggy can be unlocked with Cod8,000 in the Staff menu.
job: Eggy moves around the Kitchen, collecting pieces of cod every so often, depending on his raise level.

wearableMementos.requirements: Serve Spotted Deer 450 times. Sell 800 Adzuki Bean Dumplings.
Received via in-game Redemption Code during Anniversary Celebration 2020.
Received via in-game Redemption Code. Limited time offer.
Purchased from Christmas 2021 Package in the Diamond Store.

name: Jiji the Waiter
blurb: He's calm and objective, and he can do magic.
unlocking: Jiji can be unlocked with Cod35,000 in the Staff menu.
job: Jiji takes customers' orders for a certain amount of time, depending on his raise level, and then rests until his break is up.
note: Jiji will randomly disappear at some point in the game but someone is still taking orders as usual. This is completely normal and is tied to a surprise event. Just be patient and keep playing, Jiji will come back soon and his disappearance will be explained.

wearableMementos.requirements: Obtain from Lunar New Year Event 2022.

name: Apricat the Sweeper
blurb: A diligent worker with a big appetite but not much to say.
unlocking: Apricat can be unlocked with 15,000 cod in the Staff menu.
job: Apricat moves around the Restaurant, Kitchen, Garden, and Fishing Pond sweeping up trash for a certain amount of time, depending on her raise level, and then rests.

wearableMementos.requirements: Rewarded during the Lunar New Year event. Obtained via Gachapon.
Obtain from Lunar New Year Event 2023.
Obtained from Christmas Event 2023. Obtain via a Christmas Wishing Well.

name: Dori the Promoter
blurb: His inviting blue eyes and honest smile always attract a bunch of customers!
unlocking: Dori can be unlocked for Cod35,000 from the Staff menu.
job: Dori attracts a certain amount of customers for a certain amount of time, depending on his raise level, and then rests for a period of time.

wearableMementos.requirements: Complete Aromatic Acorn 5-Star Judging to obtain.
Obtained from Christmas Event 2023. Obtain via a Christmas Wishing Well.

name: Timmy the Server
blurb: Gumi's right-hand man who loves taking care of others and can do anything.
unlocking: Timmy can be unlocked with 30,000 cod in the Staff menu.
job: Timmy boosts movement speed and makes troublesome customers like Cod-Stealing Rabbit, Mister Roach, and Skunk leave for tea every so often.

wearableMementos.requirements: Obtained during Christmas Event 2020 via Gachapon.
Received via in-game Redemption Code. Limited time offer.
Obtained from Christmas Event 2023 via a Christmas Wishing Well.
Obtain via a Lunar New Year Wishing Well.
Received via in-game Redemption Code. Limited time offer.

name: Chef Gumi
blurb: He's indifferent to everything except cooking. He stays in the kitchen all day, every day.
unlocking: Chef Gumi can be hired by sharing to Facebook, Twitter, and Line and unlocked for 45,000 cod.
job: Chef Gumi is the chef of Animal Restaurant. He can send the Kitchen into a frenzy, increasing the cooking speed for a period of time before resting.
note: Gumi will randomly disappear at some point in the game. This is completely normal and is tied to a surprise event. Just be patient and keep playing, Gumi will come back soon and his disappearance will be explained.

wearableMementos.requirements: Restaurant in business for 14 days. Serve Swan.
Serve Cici 20 times. Sell 100 Coconut Cassia Wine.
Complete seasonal Christmas gifts. Wishing Well.
Received via in-game redemption code during Anniversary Celebration 2020.
Complete Aromatic Acorn 6-Star Judging to obtain.
Received via in-game redemption code during Anniversary Celebration Event 2021.
Purchase Super-value Chinese New Year Pack.
Received via in-game redemption code during Anniversary Event 2022.
Received via in-game redemption code during Lunar New Year Event 2023.
Obtained via Christmas Event 2023. Obtain from a Christmas Gachapon.

name: Lucky the Cashier
blurb: Loves money. Gets all starry-eyed whenever she sees cod.
unlocking: Lucky can be unlocked for Cod90,000 in the Staff menu.
job: Lucky is the restaurant cashier. She walks around collecting cod around the Restaurant, Kitchen, Buffet, and Garden for a certain amount of time, depending on her raise level, and then rests.

wearableMementos.requirements: Serve Party Puppy 12 times. Sell 100 Montblanc.

name: Prince the Gardener
blurb: He lovingly waters every single flower. He's always reading letters from B612 in his spare time.
unlocking: Prince can be hired after purchasing the Garden to the left of the restaurant for 200,000 cod in the Staff menu.
job: Prince will water growing flowers in the Garden, increasing their growth speed for a certain time, then rest.

wearableMementos.requirements: Restaurant in business for 90 days. Serve Corgi.
Obtained via Lunar New Year Event 2024.

name: Messenger Hedwig
blurb: She has a habit of wandering about most of the time, but sometimes she brings back mysterious things.
unlocking: Messenger Hedwig can be hired after unlocking the Mailbox in the Garden for 50,000 cod in the Staff menu.
job: Messenger Hedwig leaves on adventures and returns later. She can carry flowers, seeds, and watering cans in her suitcase. Depending on what she is sent with, she can bring back rewards and or letters. The Fortuneteller can make Hedwig return sooner in exchange for watching an advertisement.

wearableMementos.requirements: Obtain via a Lunar New Year Gachapon.

name: Temp Worker Yolky
blurb: Eggy says he's his little brother... (maybe Eggy found him?) He looks like he's underage, but I don't dare ask!
unlocking: Yolky can be unlocked for 100,000 cod after purchasing the Buffet expansion.
job: Yolky works part-time at the Buffet. Every 4 hours, he earns a certain amount of Plates based on his raise level.

wearableMementos.requirements: Serve White Bunny 3,000 times. Sell 3,500 Taiyaki.
Obtain from Log-In Reward during Children's Day Event.
Obtain via a Lunar New Year Gachapon.

name: Fisherman Rabbit Ding
blurb: Always going about alone. Looks fierce but is actually very timid. The fluffy fur is especially suited to warm one's legs in winter.
unlocking: Ding needs a rating of 1,500 to unlock in the Staff menu.
job: Ding will dig up bait every day in the Fishing Pond and, when she has nothing to do, she fishes and then rests for a certain period of time, depending on her raise level.

wearableMementos.requirements: Obtain via a Lunar New Year Gachapon.
Obtain via a Lunar New Year Gachapon.

name: Delivery Boy Tate
blurb: He is gentle and takes good care of his twin sister. The good-looking guy in the restaurant.
unlocking: Delivery Boy Tate can be hired for free after purchasing the Takeout to the right of the Kitchen.
job: Delivery Boy Tate delivers takeout orders and can handle multiple deliveries at the same time.

name: Delivery Girl Kate
blurb: She is absent-minded but kind. Her twin brother, Tate, has to feed her snacks so that she will not eat up the customer's food.
unlocking: Delivery Girl Kate can be hired after purchasing the Takeout to the right of the Kitchen for 600,000 cod in the Staff menu.
job: Delivery Girl Kate delivers takeout orders. She starts with the ability to deliver one order at a time and improves as she levels up.

name: Support Chef Meow
blurb: Sensitive and clingy. Falls sick easily and often hides under a blanket and cries. Needs tender loving care.
unlocking: Support Chef Meow can be hired after purchasing the Takeout to the right of the Kitchen for 800,000 cod in the Staff menu.
job: Meow will take care of the takeout section, increasing the maximum daily orders and the chance of receiving good ratings.

wearableMementos.requirements: Obtain from the Milky Flow Wishing Well.
Obtain via a Lunar New Year Gachapon.

name: Seedy the Waiter
blurb: Looks aloof but is actually just inarticulate. Has a girlfriend.
unlocking: Seedy the Waiter can be unlocked for 1,200,000 cod after unlocking the Terrace.
job: Seedy the Waiter cleans the Terrace, collecting random Terrace items every so often depending on his raise level. He can also occasionally offer an advertisement to double Meal Side Cabinet prizes.

wearableMementos.requirements: Obtain via a Lunar New Year Gachapon.

name: Paddy
blurb: Feisty and strong-willed, but always looks like she's close to tears.
unlocking: Paddy can be unlocked with 2,000,000 cod in the Staff menu.
job: Paddy works in the Vegetable Garden driving pests away from growing crops. She also shooes Chacha out of the garden when he appears, a special customer who tries to take crops. Giving Paddy raises increases her chances of success.
